product_metadata.plan_type: Non-Linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Insurance Term Plan

product_summary.objective: Bajaj Life Smart Protection Goal is a flexible term protection plan designed to secure life goals with optional Critical Illness Benefit, Return of Premium feature, and Whole Life cover up to age 99.
key_highlights: Option to choose Return of Premium (ROP) as maturity benefit
Option to opt for Whole Life cover up to age 99
Optional Critical Illness Benefit (CIB) with separate CI sum assured
Limited Pay or Regular Pay premium options
Premium rebates like salary discount, first-time buyer discount, online discount
Health Management Services (medical consultation, second opinion, case management)
important_notes: If Whole Life option is chosen, ROP is not available.
Optional benefits can be chosen only at inception and cannot be changed later.

core_benefits.details: Nominee receives Sum Assured chosen at inception. Policy terminates after payout.
core_benefits.minimum_guarantee: Death Benefit will not be less than 105% of Total Premiums Paid.

core_benefits.details: If Life Assured survives till maturity and no death claim has occurred, Total Premiums Paid is returned as lump sum.
core_benefits.rop_condition: ROP applicable for both Life Cover premium and CI premium (if CI opted).

core_benefits.details: Pays CI Sum Assured on diagnosis of listed Critical Illness, subject to waiting period, cooling period, and survival period.

minor_ci_rules.angioplasty_cap: Lower of ₹5 Lakhs or 25% of CI Sum Assured

core_benefits.details: Provides life cover up to age 99 years (only with limited premium payment option).

termination_value.availability: If ROP not opted and PPT < PT

surrender_value.condition: After completion of 1 policy year with at least 1 full premium paid
surrender_value.payable: Higher of Guaranteed Surrender Value (GSV) or Special Surrender Value (SSV)
surrender_value.cap: Not more than 100% of total premiums paid

premium_discounts.salary_rebate: 5% discount on first-year premium for salaried employees
premium_discounts.insurance_for_all_discount: 5% discount for first-time life insurance buyers
premium_discounts.female_life_rebate: Premium based on 3 years younger male rate
premium_discounts.online_discount: 6% rebate on first-year premium for online policies

must_disclose: Insurance is subject to terms and conditions.
Please read the sales brochure and policy document carefully before purchase.
compliance_rules.waiting_period_ci: 180 days waiting period applies for Critical Illness Benefit.
compliance_rules.cooling_off_minor_ci: 180 days cooling-off applies between minor CI claims.
compliance_rules.suicide_exclusion: If suicide within 12 months, payout is higher of 80% premiums paid or termination/surrender value.
compliance_rules.fraud_warning: BEWARE of spurious phone calls and fraudulent offers. IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.
compliance_rules.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits are subject to provisions of Income Tax Act amendments. Consult your tax advisor.
compliance_rules.free_look_period: 30 days free look available from receipt of policy document.

retrieval_chunks.text: Smart Protection Goal offers optional Return of Premium, optional Critical Illness Benefit, and Whole Life cover up to age 99.
Nominee receives the chosen Sum Assured as death benefit. Minimum payout will not be less than 105% of premiums paid.
Critical Illness Benefit pays lump sum on diagnosis. Minor CI pays 25%, angioplasty capped at ₹5 Lakhs, max four minor CI claims allowed.
If ROP is opted and no claims occur, total premiums paid are returned as maturity benefit at the end of policy term.
Discounts include salary rebate (5%), first-time buyer discount (5%), online discount (6%), and high sum assured rebate above ₹1 Crore.
